extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the most comprehensive ITIL exam preparation App available on the market today! You have definitely come to the right place to pass the ITIL Foundation exam on your first attempt. As an added bonus, this App is also perfect as an on-going reference for all your ITIL information needs.ITIL certification is quickly becoming seen as a must have for anyone working in IT. Are you ready to stand out amongst your peers and begin your ITIL journey by passing the ITIL 2011 Foundation exam? Download the ITIL Exam Prep Free App now and start your ITIL journey the right way!The ITIL Exam Prep Free app, brought to you by Global Management Education Solutions (Global-MES), provides a comprehensive exam question and flash card App to help you study and pass the new, completely updated, ITIL 2011 Foundation certification exam.This App covers the most important syllabus examination topics based on the latest ITIL 2011 Foundation syllabus and includes 40+ original questions with answer rationales (created by ITIL Accredited Trainers and ITIL Experts), 1 official APMG sample exam (40 questions) and 50+ ITIL flashcards. The flash cards and the multiple-choice quiz format make learning easy, fun and interactive, whilst the challenging professional content ensures you really know your material.Features of the ITIL Exam Prep Free App include:  - 40+ ITIL Foundation exam questions, broken down into ALL nine ITIL Foundation syllabus learning objectives  - 50+ flashcards covering ALL nine ITIL Foundation syllabus learning objectives. These are broken down into Introduction, Service Strategy, Service Design, Service Transition, Service Operation, Continual Service Improvement  - 1 official APMG sample exam with answer rationales (40 questions total)  - Every question has detailed explanations for EACH answer, even the incorrect answers.  - Every question has been specifically designed as a unique learning experience. You will learn just as much from why an answer is WRONG as you will from why an answer is correct  - Timed exam questions based on the timing for the real exam either native or not native English speaker (extra time available)  - Complete official ITIL glossary and acronyms  - History of ITIL explained  - Tips and Tricks for passing the ITIL 2011 Foundation Exam the first time!  - ITIL Accreditation Pathway explained (from ITIL Foundation all the way to ITIL Expert and beyond!)- No internet connection required- Completely updated content to prepare you for the ITIL 2011 Foundation certification exam

reviews.title: This is really fantastic
reviews.comment: This app is really fantastic and serves as a great tool to gain an understanding of ITIL basics. Look forward for  the expert level apps too and its definitely worth going for the paid version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant app
